method.name: rate
method.digest: how fast a grain plays in relation to its normal playback rate
method.description: how fast a grain plays in relation to its normal playback rate

method.name: transposeRandom
method.digest: randomization depth for the the transpose parameter
method.description: randomization depth for the the transpose parameter

method.name: rateMode
method.digest: sets the delay mode
method.description: sets the delay mode. 0 = normal, 1 = read from buffer based on grain index, 2 = read from buffer randomly

method.name: transpose
method.digest: control rate in semitones
method.description: control rate in semitones

method.name: rateRandom
method.digest: randomization depth for the rate parameter
method.description: randomization depth for the rate parameter

method.name: rateOffset
method.digest: the amount rate to apply rate based on grain index
method.description: the amount rate to apply rate based on grain index

method.name: transposeOffset
method.digest: the amount of transposition to apply rate based on grain index
method.description: the amount of transposition to apply rate based on grain index

method.name: glisson
method.digest: how much the pitch will change over the life of the grain based on rate
method.description: how much the pitch will change over the life of the grain based on rate

method.name: ngrains
method.digest: the number of active grains
method.description: the number of active grains

method.name: glissonSt
method.digest: controls glisson in semitones
method.description: controls glisson in semitones

method.name: delay
method.digest: the amound grains are delayed in ms
method.description: the amound grains are delayed in ms

method.name: g
method.digest: sends a message to a single grain
method.description: sends a message to a single grain

method.name: streamTarget
method.digest: messages will target grains assigned to this stream
method.description: messages will target grains assigned to this stream

method.name: target
method.digest: sends a message to a single grain
method.description: sends a message to a single grain

method.name: rateBuffer
method.digest: sets the buffer for rate modes 1 and 2
method.description: sets the buffer for rate modes 1 and 2

method.name: window
method.digest: sets the position of the window
method.description: sets the position of the window

method.name: windowMode
method.digest: sets the delay mode
method.description: sets the delay mode. 0 = normal, 1 = read from buffer based on grain index, 2 = read from buffer randomly

method.name: space
method.digest: the amound of emty space at the end of each grains as a ratio of the total grain size
method.description: the amound of emty space at the end of each grains as a ratio of the total grain size

method.name: buf
method.digest: sets the granulation buffer
method.description: sets the granulation buffer

method.name: streamDeviate
method.digest: will deviate any parameter based on streams
method.description: will deviate any parameter based on streams

method.name: streamSpread
method.digest: will create evenly spaced values between each number based on streams
method.description: will create evenly spaced values between each number based on streams

method.name: density
method.digest: the probability a grain will play
method.description: the probability a grain will play

method.name: delayMode
method.digest: sets the delay mode
method.description: sets the delay mode. 0 = normal, 1 = read from buffer based on grain index, 2 = read from buffer randomly

method.name: env
method.digest: sets the envelope buffer
method.description: sets the envelope buffer

method.name: delayBuffer
method.digest: sets the buffer for delay modes 1 and 2
method.description: sets the buffer for delay modes 1 and 2

method.name: windowBuffer
method.digest: sets the buffer for window modes 1 and 2
method.description: sets the buffer for window modes 1 and 2
